sentence.Network_en: Mammals arose from a fairly primitive reptile in the Mesozoic era.
sentence.Network_cn: 哺乳类起源于中生代宛若原始的爬虫类.

sentence.Network_en: Danba area has undergone multiperiod deformation, metamorphism and magmatism since Mesozoic time.
sentence.Network_cn: 丹巴地区自中生代以来经历了多期的变形 、 变质和岩浆作用.

sentence.Network_en: The deposition velocity of Paleozoic, Mesozoic and Cenozoic assumes unimodal pattern.
sentence.Network_cn: 在沉积速率分析曲线上,往往是古生代 、 生代和新生代呈单峰状态.
